tools.processing.sampler

Module Contents

Classes

SamplingProcessor

Sampling Processing Class.
class tools.processing.sampler.SamplingProcessor(reference: anndata.AnnData, cluster_col: str, ratio: Optional[float] = None, random_state: int = settings.random_state)[source]

Sampling Processing Class.

reference

References dataset.

Type:

anndata.AnnData

sampling_ratio

Temporary sampling ratio, range in [0, 1).

Type:

float, default=None

cluster_label

Column name of cell type label.

Type:

str

raw_count

Cell count of raw dataset.

Type:

int

latest_label

Sampling selection label of specific method and ratio (latest applied).

Type:

str

oversampling_dataset

Oversampling dataset, generated by imblearn.over_sampling.SMOTE

Type:

anndata.AnnData

metadata

Metadata of cluster-specific factors.

Type:

pandas.DataFrame

random_state

Random state.

Type:

int

Notes

This is a beta version.

Examples

>>> import scanpy as sc
>>> data = sc.read_h5ad("path/to/h5ad/file")
>>> sampler = SamplingProcessor(reference=data, cluster_col="cell_type", random_state=0)
>>> sampler.sampling("balance")
sampling(strategy: str) → anndata.AnnData[source]

Sampling function with strategy parameter.

Parameters:

strategy (str, {'stratify', 'balance', 'compactness', 'complexity', 'concave', 'convex', 'entropy'}) – Sampling strategy chosen from tools.config.SamplingStrategy.

Return type:

Sampled dataset as anndata.AnnData object.

_reset_ratio(ratio: float) → None[source]
get_target_dataset(col: Optional[str] = None) → anndata.AnnData[source]

Get sampled dataset.

generate_factors() → None[source]

Generate cluster-specific factors.

_check_factor(factor_type: str) → None[source]

Optimize generation of specific factor.

Parameters:

factor_type – Type of factor chosen from tools.config.SamplingStrategy

_generate_oversampling() → None[source]

Generate oversampling dataset by SMOTE.

SMOTE is the most stable oversampling method (Generate fully-balanced dataset)

_stratify() → anndata.AnnData[source]

Classical stratified sampling method.

_imbalance_sampling(target_ratio: numpy.array) → anndata.AnnData[source]

Imbalanced sampling operation.

Parameters:

target_ratio – target sampling ratio for each cluster

Return type:

sampled dataset as anndata.AnnData object

suggest_ratio(strategy: str, quantile: float = 0.99) → float[source]

Generate suggested sampling ratio.

Parameters:

  • strategy – Type of sampling strategy chosen from tools.config.SamplingStrategy

  • quantile – Customized quantile for hypothesis test.
